Neighborhood enrichment analysis

Source: R/neighborhoodEnrichment.R
neighborhoodEnrichment.Rd

Performs enrichment analysis of neighborhoods.

Usage

neighborhoodEnrichment(
  POLYspace,
  region = TRUE,
  delimiter_node = "--",
  delimiter_region_celltype = "_",
  neighborhoods_of_interest = "default",
  permutation_times = 100,
  p_adjust_method = "fdr",
  ncores = 1,
  mc.preschedule = TRUE,
  set_seed = TRUE,
  seed = 123
)

Arguments

POLYspace

A POLYspace object.

region

Logical; include region-level stratification.

delimiter_node

Delimiter between node labels (default "--").

delimiter_region_celltype

Delimiter between region and cell type (default "_").

neighborhoods_of_interest

Character vector of neighborhoods of interest or "default".

permutation_times

Integer; number of permutations (default 100).

p_adjust_method

Method for p-value adjustment (e.g., "fdr").

ncores

Number of CPU cores.

mc.preschedule

Logical; passed to parallel::mclapply().

set_seed

Logical; if TRUE, set the RNG seed to seed.

seed

Integer RNG seed.

Value

An updated POLYspace object whose results slot includes tables of enrichment statistics.
